title: How to Make a DIY Rainbow Fan

steps.headline: Clean fan blades.
Paint blades.
steps.description: Apply two coats of paint to each blade, taking time to allow each coat to dry. Brush strokes should be evenly applied to reduce streaking.

steps.headline: Replace fan cover and turn on fan.
steps.description:
Watch the colors blend together as they whir in a circular fashion, cooling the room and brightening your day. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/30\/Make-a-DIY-Rainbow-Fan-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-a-DIY-Rainbow-Fan-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/30\/Make-a-DIY-Rainbow-Fan-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-a-DIY-Rainbow-Fan-Step-3Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"
